attributes.action: Reverse the pathetic interpritation of hire and reward to enable companies to run staff transport and avoid increasing traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Staff Transport to and from work is classed as hire and reward requiring an "O" Licence and a PCV driving licence in a time when we are trying to car share and reduce traffic companies are being forced to swap a mini bus for three cars or two MPV,s
